Class TextTranslationJobProperties

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.services.translate.model.TextTranslationJobProperties
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Provides information about a translation job.

      • getTerminologyNames

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getTerminologyNames()

        A list containing the names of the terminologies applied to a translation job. Only one terminology can be applied per StartTextTranslationJob request at this time.

        A list containing the names of the terminologies applied to a translation job. Only one terminology can be applied per StartTextTranslationJob request at this time.

      • getDataAccessRoleArn

        public java.lang.String getDataAccessRoleArn()

        The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS Identity Access and Management (IAM) role that granted Amazon Translate read access to the job's input data.

        Constraints:
        Length: 20 - 2048
        Pattern: arn:aws(-[^:]+)?:iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.+

        Returns:

        The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an AWS Identity Access and Management (IAM) role that granted Amazon Translate read access to the job's input data.
